english.segment1: I will bless the Lord forever. And I will trust Him at all times. He has delivered me from all sin. And he has set my feet upon a rock
english.segment2: And I will not be moved. And I'll say of the Lord..
english.segment3: You are my shield. My strength. My portion. Deliverer. My shelter. Strong tower. My very present help in time of need
english.segment4: Whom have I in Heaven but you?. There's none I desire beside you. You have made me glad. And I'll say of the Lord..
english.segment6: You are my shield. My strength. My portion. Deliverer. My shelter. Strong tower. My very present help in time of need
english.segment8: You have me glad. And I'll say of the Lord..
english.segment10: My very present help in time of need
